#### R

a.
```{r}

## Loading data
## ----------------------------------------------
growth.dat <- read.table("../../data/model_growth.dat", header=TRUE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
C_M <- subset(growth.dat, var=="C_M")
C_S <- subset(growth.dat, var=="C_S")
```

```{r}
## Plotting data
## ----------------------------------------------
plot(C_S$t, C_S$data, type="b", xlab="Time", ylab="Concentration")
lines(C_M$t, C_M$data, type="b", pch=17, col=2)
legend("topright", legend=c("Substrate", "Microorganisms"), col=c(1,2), pch=c(1,17), lty=1)

```

b.
```{r}

## Combining Data
## ----------------------------------------------
## Construct new data frame
y.df <- data.frame( cbind( rep( "C_new", nrow(y.obs.dep) ), y.obs.dep ) )
names(y.df) <- colnames(growth.dat)

## Combine the two data sets
growth.dat.long <- rbind(growth.dat, y.df)

```
